name: AMOGUS
description:
§4A§rnti §4M§rigrator §4O§rptions, §4G§ramma §4U§rnblock §4S§rystem
This mod shows the positions of players with migration capes by placing a red glowing armor stand at their positions, giving them a disadvantage at hiding. Future versions might include reach against migration cape wearers.
It also re-enables editing the options.txt file beyond the in-game limits and increases the in-game "gamma" top limit to 5.0/500%, the top limit for speedrunning.
